open.title: Degraded Services | Western and Eastern Cape
open.description: Our upstream provider is experiencing an outage in the Western and Eastern Cape that is affecting Afrihost services in the area. We are working with them to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Outage is being caused by multiple NLD failures, teams are working on resolving the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Northern Park
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Northern Park, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
